name: Elem-mint
tagline: Create DOM elements on the fly with strings
body:
## Create Use Elem-mint to create DOM objects on the fly -- strings most certainly attached. XD. ````javascript $E("div#first[name=thefirst]");//
```` #### yes, it's that easy *** ### so why not try it? ###### Ultra lightweight ###### **Simple** ###### *Reusable* *** ###### [npm link](https://www.npmjs.com/package/elem-mint) *** #### Want to use an online host? ###### Add https://cdn.rawgit.com/spritefullake/elem-mint/master/Source/index.min.js ###### as the source of your script tag.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
